summary: This is a multiple follower friendly and lightweight modification of the vanilla location 'Bilegulch Mine'.
descriptionHtml:
This is a multiple follower friendly and lightweight modification of the vanilla location 'Bilegulch Mine'. Designed to be a base of operations for the player and many of his/her followers.

Contains the following additions :

- Multiple bedrolls
- Benches and chairs
- Plenty of lights (candles and torches)
- A campfire and a cooking pot
- A tanning rack
- A couple of wood chopping blocks
- An enchanting table
- An alchemy table
- A player chest that doesn't respawn

Modified areas are re-navmeshed.

Made it for my own personal use and just wanted to share.

Manual Installation:
----------------------------------
Just drop it in the Data folder and activate it, preferably after you cleaned out the mine. Bandits will continue to respawn in the area, so be sure to visit the place once in a week to prevent that.
author: Kinlar
